name: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Worlds Remodel
summary:
The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Worlds Remodel recreates Parallel Worlds according to the 6 years of revisions from players all over the globe. Featuring new grafics, various asm patches, completely new overworld and dungeons, etc.

It is suitable for beginners and veterans, for those who have failed at Parallel Worlds and for those who have finished it, since this game is a lot more than just a plain reduction of sprites.

It's a game that’s fair to the player and doesn’t want to force any super tricks, stunts or logic to finish the game, while still having a decent difficulty. It makes Parallel Worlds enjoyable. You don’t have to use save states or cheats to finish the game. You don’t have to be a veteran or a super player either. You will not be frustrated while playing.
